rows.name: Acid Fog
rows.short_description: Billowing acid fog slows sight/movement and deals 2d6 acid damage each round.

rows.name: Acid Splash
rows.short_description: Ranged touch attack; 1d3 acid damage.

rows.name: Aid
rows.short_description: +1 morale on attacks and saves vs. fear; 1d8 + caster level (max +10) temporary hp.

rows.name: Air Walk
rows.short_description: Subject walks on air as if solid; can ascend/descend at 45°; winds can push the subject.

rows.name: Alarm
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
rows.short_description: Wards an area; mental ‘ping’ to you or audible bell when creatures enter.

rows.name: Align Weapon
rows.target: Weapon touched or fifty projectiles (all in contact at casting)
rows.short_description: Makes a weapon good/evil/lawful/chaotic to bypass DR; not usable on natural weapons.

rows.name: Alter Self
rows.short_description: Assume the form of a same-type creature within one size; gain its physical qualities.

rows.name: Analyze Dweomer
rows.target: One object or creature per caster level
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Reveals spells on creatures/objects and magic item functions; attended objects may save.

rows.name: Animal Growth
rows.target: Up to one animal (Gargantuan or smaller) per two levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Doubles animals’ size; +8 Str, +4 Con, –2 Dex, +2 natural armor; DR 10/magic; +4 on saves.

rows.name: Animal Messenger
rows.short_description: Compels a Tiny animal to carry a message to a designated location.

rows.name: Animal Shapes
rows.target: Up to one willing creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Transforms multiple willing creatures into the same animal forms; each can revert individually.

rows.name: Animal Trance
rows.target: Animals or magical beasts with Intelligence 1 or 2
rows.short_description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of low-Int animals or magical beasts with music or chanting.

rows.name: Animate Dead
rows.short_description: Creates skeletons or zombies under your control (HD limits; black onyx material).

rows.name: Animate Objects
rows.target: One Small object per caster level; see text
rows.short_description: Animates nonmagical objects (size-based counts) to attack; you can retarget as a move action.

rows.name: Animate Plants
rows.target: One Large plant per three caster levels or all plants within range; see text
rows.short_description: Animates plants as attackers or causes all plants in range to entangle creatures.

rows.name: Animate Rope
rows.target: One ropelike object, length up to 50 ft. + 5 ft./level; see text
rows.short_description: Commands rope to coil, loop, knot, or entangle on a hit; +2 bonus on your Use Rope checks.

rows.name: Antilife Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile field hedges out living creatures except constructs, elementals, outsiders, and undead.

rows.name: Antimagic Field
rows.short_description: Suppresses magic in area; summoned/incorporeal creatures wink out; magic items function as mundane.

rows.name: Antiplant Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile barrier keeps plant creatures and animated plants at bay.

rows.name: Antipathy
rows.target: One location (up to a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
rows.short_description: Object or area repels a specified creature kind or alignment; failed save forces shunning.

rows.name: Arcane Eye
rows.short_description: Invisible sensor transmits sight; moves 30 ft./round (10 ft. when scanning surfaces).

rows.name: Arcane Lock
rows.target: The door, chest, or portal touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size
rows.short_description: Magically locks a portal; +10 to break DC; knock suppresses for 10 minutes; caster can pass freely.

rows.name: Arcane Mark
rows.short_description: Inscribes your personal rune (visible or invisible) on any surface without harm.

rows.name: Arcane Sight
rows.short_description: See locations and strengths of magical auras within 120 ft.; identify schools with Spellcraft.

rows.name: Arcane Sight, Greater
rows.short_description: As arcane sight, plus you automatically know which spells or magic effects are active on what you see.

rows.name: Astral Projection
rows.target: You plus one additional willing creature touched per two caster levels
rows.short_description: Projects astral bodies linked by silver cords to travel planes; bodies left in suspended animation.

rows.name: Atonement
rows.short_description: Removes burden of misdeeds or restores class/spell powers; deliberate cases cost 500 XP.

rows.name: Augury
rows.short_description: Predicts weal, woe, both, or nothing for an action within ~30 minutes (70% +1%/level, max 90%).

rows.name: Awaken
rows.short_description: Grants animal or tree sentience and speech (friendly to you); XP cost.

rows.name: Baleful Polymorph
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude negates, Will partial; see text
rows.short_description: Transforms target into a Small or smaller 1-HD animal; retains alignment and hp; Will save may retain mind.

rows.name: Bane
rows.short_description: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and –1 on saves vs. fear; counters and dispels bless.

rows.name: Banishment
rows.target: One or more extraplanar creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Forces extraplanar creatures back to their home plane; bonuses with distasteful foci.

rows.name: Barkskin
rows.short_description: +2 enhancement to natural armor (+1/3 levels above 3rd, to +5).

rows.name: Bear’s Endurance
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Constitution.

rows.name: Bear’s Endurance, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As bear’s endurance, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Bestow Curse
rows.short_description: –6 to an ability score, or –4 on attacks/saves/ability/skill checks, or 50% chance to do nothing each turn.

rows.name: Bigby’s Clenched Fist
rows.short_description: Large force hand that interposes, pushes, or strikes; on hit 1d8+11 damage and Fort save or stunned 1 round.

rows.name: Bigby’s Crushing Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand grapples (deals 2d6+12 on grapple) or interposes/bull rushes with strong bonuses.

rows.name: Bigby’s Forceful Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand pursues and bull rushes designated opponent with a +14 Strength check bonus.

rows.name: Bigby’s Grasping Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand grapples and holds, can bull rush or interpose.

rows.name: Bigby’s Interposing Hand
rows.short_description: Large force hand provides cover and slows foes trying to pass; persists between you and one target.

rows.name: Binding
rows.short_description: Magically restrains a creature in various forms (chaining, slumber, prisons, etc.) with optional triggers.

rows.name: Blade Barrier
rows.saving_throw: Reflex half or Reflex negates; see text
rows.short_description: Immobile wall of force blades deals 1d6/level (max 15d6) to creatures passing through; provides cover.

rows.name: Blasphemy
rows.area: Nonevil creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Harms nonevil creatures by HD (daze/weaken/paralyze/kill); banishes nonevil extraplanar creatures on home plane.

rows.name: Bless
rows.area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
rows.short_description: Allies gain +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs. fear; counters and dispels bane.

rows.name: Bless Water
rows.short_description: Makes holy water in a flask.

rows.name: Bless Weapon
rows.short_description: Weapon counts as good and as +1 for bypassing DR vs. evil; auto-confirms critical threats vs. evil foes.

rows.name: Blight
rows.short_description: Withers a plant; plant creatures take 1d6/level (max 15d6).

rows.name: Blindness/Deafness
rows.short_description: Makes subject blinded or deafened.

rows.name: Blink
rows.short_description: You randomly flicker between Material and Ethereal; attacks vs. you 50% miss (often 20%); many other effects.

rows.name: Blur
rows.short_description: Subject gains concealment (20% miss chance).

rows.name: Break Enchantment
rows.target: Up to one creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses; CL check vs. 11 + effect’s CL (max +15).

rows.name: Bull’s Strength
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Strength.

rows.name: Bull’s Strength, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As bull’s strength, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Burning Hands
rows.short_description: Cone of flame deals 1d4/level (max 5d4); ignites combustibles.

rows.name: Call Lightning
rows.short_description: Call one 5-ft.-wide, 30-ft.-long bolt/round (max CL bolts), 3d6 damage (3d10 outdoors in storm).

rows.name: Call Lightning Storm
rows.short_description: As call lightning, but each bolt deals 5d6 (or 5d10 outdoors in storm), max 15 bolts.

rows.name: Calm Animals
rows.target: Animals within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Soothes ordinary animals (Int 1–2); pacifies 2d4 + caster level HD; trained/ dire animals get a save.

rows.name: Calm Emotions
rows.short_description: Suppresses emotion effects (rage, fear, bardic music, morale bonuses) and prevents violent acts.

rows.name: Cat’s Grace
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Dexterity.

rows.name: Cat’s Grace, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As cat’s grace, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Cause Fear
rows.target: One living creature with 5 or fewer HD
rows.short_description: Subject with ≤5 HD is frightened (or shaken 1 round on save); creatures with 6+ HD are immune.

rows.name: Chain Lightning
rows.target: One primary target, plus one secondary target/level (each within 30 ft. of the primary target)
rows.short_description: Primary bolt 1d6/level (max 20d6); arcs to up to CL secondary targets for half damage.

rows.name: Changestaff
rows.short_description: Your prepared quarterstaff becomes a Huge treantlike guardian that obeys you.

rows.name: Chaos Hammer
rows.short_description: Damages lawful creatures (1d8/2 levels or 1d6/level vs. lawful outsiders) and slows them; half damage to neutrals.

rows.name: Charm Animal
rows.short_description: As charm person, but affects an animal.

rows.name: Charm Monster
rows.short_description: As charm person, but any creature.

rows.name: Charm Monster, Mass
rows.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As charm monster, but affects multiple creatures up to 2× caster level total HD (min 1 creature).

rows.name: Charm Person
rows.short_description: Makes one humanoid regard you as a trusted friend; +5 save if you or allies are threatening.

rows.name: Chill Metal
rows.target: Metal equipment of one creature per two levels (no two more than 30 ft. apart); or 25 lb. of metal/level, contiguous
rows.short_description: Makes metal icy cold; damages creatures wearing/carrying it per round; counters heat metal.

rows.name: Chill Touch
rows.target: Creature or creatures touched (up to one/level)
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude partial or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Touch deals 1d6 damage and 1 Str damage (Fort negates Str); undead must Will save or flee.

rows.name: Circle of Death
rows.area: Several living creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Kills 1d4 HD/level of living creatures (max 20d4), starting with lowest HD; no effect on 9+ HD creatures.

rows.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
rows.short_description: Creates unseen sensor at a known locale to hear or see; sensor is stationary.

rows.name: Cloak of Chaos
rows.target: One creature/level in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: +4 deflection AC and +4 resistance saves, SR 25 vs. lawful; blocks mental control; melee attackers (lawful) are confused 1 round (Will negates).

rows.name: Clone
rows.short_description: Creates inert duplicate to receive soul if original dies; grows over 2d4 months.

rows.name: Cloudkill
rows.short_description: Poisonous fog kills ≤3 HD, harms 4–6 HD and higher; heavy gas rolls away from you.

rows.name: Color Spray
rows.short_description: Cone of colors stuns/blinds/unconscious by HD (2- HD worst).

rows.name: Command
rows.short_description: Subject obeys a one-word command (approach, drop, fall, flee, halt).

rows.name: Command, Greater
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will negates (new save each round after the first)
rows.short_description: As command, but affects multiple creatures and lasts longer; each gets a new save each round after the first.

rows.name: Command Plants
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of plant creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As charm effect for plant creatures; you can influence their actions with opposed Charisma checks.

rows.name: Command Undead
rows.short_description: Control one undead; mindless get no save; intelligent act as if charmed; hostile acts break the spell.

rows.name: Commune
rows.short_description: Ask your deity yes/no questions (one per two CL in SRD; here one/CL per text) with concise answers; risk of “unclear.”

rows.name: Commune with Nature
rows.short_description: Learn up to three facts about the surrounding natural terrain and denizens (range varies by environment).

rows.name: Comprehend Languages
rows.short_description: Understand spoken or written language you touch; reads ~1 page/minute; doesn’t decode ciphers.

rows.name: Cone of Cold
rows.short_description: Deals 1d6/level cold damage (max 15d6) in a cone.

rows.name: Confusion
rows.short_description: Subjects behave randomly each round (attack, babble, flee, or act normally).

rows.name: Confusion, Lesser
rows.short_description: One creature is confused for 1 round.

rows.name: Consecrate
rows.short_description: Fills area with positive energy; +3 on turn checks; undead take –1 on attacks/damage/saves; doubles effects if allied altar present.

rows.name: Contact Other Plane
rows.short_description: Ask planar powers yes/no questions; risk temporary Int/Cha loss; accuracy depends on plane/deity rank.

rows.name: Contagion
rows.short_description: Infects subject with chosen disease (strikes immediately); later saves use disease DC.

rows.name: Contingency
rows.short_description: Sets a spell of up to 1/3 your CL (max 6th) to trigger automatically under specified conditions.

rows.name: Continual Flame
rows.short_description: Object shines like a torch without heat; can be covered but not quenched.

rows.name: Control Plants
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of plant creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Command the actions of plant creatures for a short time; suicidal orders ignored.

rows.name: Control Undead
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Command multiple undead for a short time; intelligent undead remember being controlled.

rows.name: Control Water
rows.area: Water in a volume of 10 ft./level by 10 ft./level by 2 ft./level (S)
rows.short_description: Raises or lowers bodies of water; can slow water creatures (as slow) on a save; forms whirlpools in deep water.

rows.name: Control Weather
rows.area: 2-mile-radius circle, centered on you; see text
rows.short_description: Changes local weather appropriate to climate/season; adjust wind and general conditions.

rows.name: Control Winds
rows.short_description: Alters wind direction/strength within a large cylinder; can form tornado/hurricane effects; creatures save each round.

rows.name: Create Food and Water
rows.short_description: Creates simple, nourishing food (spoils in 24 hours) and clean water (does not spoil).

rows.name: Create Greater Undead
rows.short_description: As create undead but creates stronger undead (shadow, wraith, spectre, devourer) based on caster level; must be cast at night; requires black onyx gems.

rows.name: Create Undead
rows.short_description: Creates a ghoul, ghast, mummy, or mohrg based on caster level; undead aren’t automatically under your control; must be cast at night and uses black onyx (50 gp/HD).

rows.name: Create Water
rows.short_description: Creates clean, drinkable water (about 8 lb./gallon).

rows.name: Creeping Doom
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)/100 ft.; see text
rows.short_description: Summons up to one centipede swarm/2 levels (max 10) you can command within 100 ft.

rows.name: Crushing Despair
rows.short_description: Creatures in cone take –2 on attacks, saves, ability/skill checks, and weapon damage; counters/dispels good hope.

rows.name: Cure Critical Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 4d8 +1/level (max +20) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 4d8 +1/level (max +40) to multiple creatures; harms undead.

rows.name: Cure Light Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 1d8 +1/level (max +5) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: Heals 1d8 +1/level (max +25) to each of multiple targets; harms undead (Will half).

rows.name: Cure Minor Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 1 hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 2d8 +1/level (max +10) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 2d8 +1/level (max +30); harms undead.

rows.name: Cure Serious Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 3d8 +1/level (max +15) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 3d8 +1/level (max +35); harms undead.

rows.name: Curse Water
rows.short_description: Imbues 1 pint of water with negative energy, creating unholy water.

rows.name: Dancing Lights
rows.short_description: Create up to four moving lights that must remain within a 10-ft. radius of each other.

rows.name: Darkness
rows.short_description: Object radiates shadowy illumination in 20-ft. radius; grants concealment; counters/dispelled by equal or lower light spells.

rows.name: Darkvision
rows.short_description: Subject can see 60 ft. in total darkness (black-and-white vision only).

rows.name: Daylight
rows.short_description: Object shines like daylight: bright light 60 ft., dim light +60 ft.; counters darkness of equal or lower level.

rows.name: Daze
rows.target: One humanoid creature of 4 HD or less
rows.short_description: One humanoid of 4 HD or less loses action for 1 round.

rows.name: Daze Monster
rows.target: One living creature of 6 HD or less
rows.short_description: As daze, but affects any living creature of 6 HD or less.

rows.name: Death Knell
rows.duration: Instantaneous/10 minutes per HD of subject; see text
rows.short_description: Slay a dying creature; you gain 1d8 temp hp, +2 Str, and +1 caster level for 10 minutes/HD.

rows.name: Death Ward
rows.short_description: Immunity to death spells/effects, energy drain, and negative energy effects.

rows.name: Deathwatch
rows.short_description: Know the condition of creatures near death in a cone; pierces feign death effects.

rows.name: Deep Slumber
rows.area: One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: As sleep but affects up to 10 HD of creatures.

rows.name: Deeper Darkness
rows.short_description: As darkness but 60-ft. radius and longer duration; counters/dispel light of equal or lower level.

rows.name: Delay Poison
rows.short_description: Subject is immune to poison effects for the duration (existing poison is suspended).

rows.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
rows.short_description: As fireball but 1d6/level (max 20d6) and you may delay the detonation up to 5 rounds.

rows.name: Demand
rows.short_description: As sending, but message (≤25 words) includes a suggestion the subject tries to carry out; target may reply briefly.

rows.name: Desecrate
rows.short_description: Fills area with negative energy: –3 on turning checks; undead gain +1 on attacks, damage, saves, and +1 hp/HD; effects double near your deity’s altar; can instead curse rival deity’s site; counters/dispels consecrate.

rows.name: Destruction
rows.short_description: Instantly slays and utterly consumes target on a failed save; on a successful save, target takes 10d6 damage. Only true resurrection, wish+resurrection, or miracle can restore the slain.

rows.name: Detect Animals or Plants
rows.short_description: Choose a kind; learn presence, then number/health, then exact locations/conditions of that animal or plant in a cone.

rows.name: Detect Chaos
rows.short_description: As detect evil but reveals chaotic auras (creatures, spells, items); overwhelming chaos can stun lawful casters.

rows.name: Detect Evil
rows.short_description: Reveals evil auras and their strength; lingering auras persist; overwhelming evil can stun good casters (if source is ≥2× level).

rows.name: Detect Good
rows.short_description: As detect evil, but detects good auras; overwhelming good can stun evil casters.

rows.name: Detect Law
rows.short_description: As detect evil, but detects lawful auras; overwhelming law can stun chaotic casters.

rows.name: Detect Magic
rows.short_description: Detects magical auras; reveals number/strength and schools with Spellcraft; auras linger; can be made permanent.

rows.name: Detect Poison
rows.short_description: Detects poison in a creature, object, or area; DC 20 Wis or Craft (alchemy) can identify the exact poison; blocked by lead/stone/metal thicknesses.

rows.name: Detect Scrying
rows.short_description: Alerts you to scrying; reveals sensor locations; if the attempt originates within area, learn location; otherwise opposed caster level checks to glimpse the scrier and gauge direction/distance.

rows.name: Detect Secret Doors
rows.short_description: Reveals secret doors/compartments; learn presence, then number/locations, then mechanism/trigger with continued concentration.

rows.name: Detect Snares and Pits
rows.short_description: Detects simple pits, deadfalls, snares, some natural hazards; not complex or magical traps (except snare); reveals presence, then number/locations, then type/trigger.

rows.name: Detect Thoughts
rows.short_description: Detects surface thoughts: presence, then number/Int scores, then thoughts; high Int can stun; must recast to try again after a save.

rows.name: Detect Undead
rows.short_description: Reveals undead auras, their number, strength, and locations; overwhelming auras can stun good casters; auras linger.

rows.name: Dictum
rows.area: Nonlawful creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Nonlawful creatures suffer effects by HD: deafened, slowed, paralyzed, or killed; also banishes nonlawful extraplanar creatures from your home plane (Will –4 negates); unaffected if HD exceed your caster level.

rows.name: Dimension Door
rows.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
rows.short_description: Teleports you (and limited cargo/allies) to a spot in range; if arriving in solid matter, you’re shunted and take damage; no further actions until your next turn.

rows.name: Dimensional Anchor
rows.short_description: Ray bars extradimensional travel (teleport, plane shift, etc.) on the struck creature/object; doesn’t affect astral/ethereal movement already in progress.

rows.name: Dimensional Lock
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
rows.short_description: Area wards against extradimensional travel (teleport, plane shift, etc.); doesn’t impede astral/ethereal movement already occurring or extradimensional perception/attacks; summoned creatures still depart when their time ends.

rows.name: Diminish Plants
rows.short_description: Prune Growth: trim/untangle normal vegetation in a large area within long range; Stunt Growth: reduce productivity of normal plants within 1/2 mile by one-third for a year; counters plant growth; no effect on plant creatures.

rows.name: Discern Lies
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Know if a subject deliberately and knowingly speaks a lie; does not reveal the truth or unintentional errors; you can switch targets each round.

rows.name: Discern Location
rows.short_description: Reveals exact location (place/building, community, county, country, continent, plane); only mind blank or a deity’s direct intervention blocks; requires prior sight or a personal link (creature) or prior touch (object).

rows.name: Disguise Self
rows.short_description: Change your appearance (1 ft. height change, same body type); +10 on Disguise; tactile and audio unchanged.

rows.name: Disintegrate
rows.short_description: Green ray deals 2d6/level (max 40d6); creatures reduced to 0 or fewer hp are disintegrated; objects: disintegrates up to one 10-ft. cube; Fort save for 5d6 partial.

rows.name: Dismissal
rows.short_description: Sends one extraplanar creature back to its home plane (special Will DC = spell DC − target’s HD + your caster level); 20% chance of wrong plane.

rows.name: Dispel Chaos
rows.target: You and a touched chaotic outsider; or you and a chaotic spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects chaotic creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. chaotic creatures; melee touch can banish chaotic outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one chaotic spell or any one enchantment cast by a chaotic creature.

rows.name: Dispel Evil
rows.target: You and a touched evil outsider; or you and an evil spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: You gain +4 deflection AC vs. evil; melee touch can banish evil outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one evil spell or any one enchantment cast by an evil creature.

rows.name: Dispel Good
rows.target: You and a touched good outsider; or you and a good spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects good creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. good; melee touch can banish good outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one good spell or any one enchantment cast by a good creature.

rows.name: Dispel Law
rows.target: You and a touched lawful outsider; or you and a lawful spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects lawful creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. lawful; melee touch can banish lawful outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one lawful spell or any one enchantment cast by a lawful creature.

rows.name: Dispel Magic
rows.short_description: Ends ongoing spells, suppresses magic items (1d4 rounds), or counters spells; dispel check 1d20 + caster level (max +10) vs. DC 11 + effect’s caster level.

rows.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
rows.short_description: As dispel magic, but dispel check max +20; can also dispel effects removable by remove curse (even if basic dispel magic can’t).

rows.name: Displacement
rows.short_description: Subject appears 2 ft. from true location; attackers have 50% miss chance as if total concealment; true seeing reveals.

rows.name: Disrupt Undead
rows.short_description: Ray of positive energy deals 1d6 damage to one undead on a hit (ranged touch).

rows.name: Disrupting Weapon
rows.short_description: Touched melee weapon destroys struck undead of HD ≤ your caster level (Will negates; no SR vs. destruction effect).

rows.name: Divination
rows.short_description: Gives useful advice regarding a specific goal/event/activity within 1 week; 70% +1%/level accuracy (max 90%); costly incense/offering (25 gp).

rows.name: Divine Favor
rows.short_description: +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage per three caster levels (min +1, max +3).

rows.name: Divine Power
rows.short_description: Your BAB = character level; +6 enhancement to Str; gain 1 temporary hp/level.

rows.name: Dominate Animal
rows.short_description: Telepathic control of one animal; simple commands; suicidal orders ignored; can direct mentally within range.

rows.name: Dominate Monster
rows.short_description: As dominate person but any creature type; telepathic control, remote range on same plane; new saves for actions against nature.

rows.name: Dominate Person
rows.short_description: Telepathic control of a humanoid; can concentrate for sensory impressions; new saves for actions against nature; protection from evil blocks control while active.

rows.name: Doom
rows.short_description: Subject becomes shaken.

rows.name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
rows.target: One object ≤10 lb. and ≤6 ft. long
rows.short_description: Arcane mark item; inscribe its name on a 1,000 gp sapphire; later speak word and crush gem to summon the item to hand (fails if in a creature’s possession; you learn who/rough location).

rows.name: Dream
rows.short_description: Messenger enters recipient’s dream to deliver any-length message; one-way; fails on creatures that don’t sleep/dream; messenger is helpless while in trance.

rows.name: Eagle's Splendor
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Charisma; affects skills/uses and increases save DCs of Cha-based spells cast during duration (no extra bonus spells).

rows.name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As eagle’s splendor, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Earthquake
rows.short_description: Localized tremor knocks creatures down, opens fissures, collapses structures/roofs/cliffs; details vary by terrain; pinned creatures take ongoing nonlethal damage.

rows.name: Elemental Swarm
rows.short_description: Opens portal to a chosen Elemental Plane; summons 2d4 Large elementals, then 1d4 Huge after 10 min, then one greater after 10 more min; all have max hp and obey; counts as air/earth/fire/water spell matching the element.

rows.name: Endure Elements
rows.short_description: Inures subject to severe heat/cold (–50°F to 140°F) but not energy damage or other hazards.

rows.name: Energy Drain
rows.short_description: Ray bestows 2d4 negative levels (no save to gain); 24 hours later each requires Fort save or victim loses a level; undead instead gain 10×(2d4) temp hp for 1 hour.

rows.name: Enervation
rows.short_description: Ray gives 1d4 negative levels; if negative levels ≥ HD, target dies; undead gain 5×(1d4) temp hp for 1 hour.

rows.name: Enlarge Person
rows.short_description: Humanoid doubles height (one size larger): +2 Str, –2 Dex (min 1), –1 attack/AC; gear enlarges; thrown/projectile damage rules apply; counters/dispels reduce person.

rows.name: Enlarge Person, Mass
rows.target: One humanoid creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As enlarge person, but multiple creatures.

rows.name: Entangle
rows.short_description: Plants grab creatures; entangled or half speed with Reflex save; checks to break free; reattempts each round.

rows.name: Enthrall
rows.short_description: Audience is captivated as you speak/sing; most become friendly/indifferent; new saves if opposed actions; ends on hostility; heckling group can break effect.

rows.name: Entropic Shield
rows.short_description: Shimmering field gives 20% miss chance vs. ranged attacks that require an attack roll (including rays).

rows.name: Erase
rows.short_description: Removes magical or mundane writing; auto-erases unattended mundane text; magic text requires CL check vs. DC 15; failure on certain wards triggers them.

rows.name: Ethereal Jaunt
rows.short_description: You become ethereal; move through objects, see/hear 60 ft. into Material; force/abjuration effects affect you; ending inside matter shunts you and deals 1d6/5 ft.

rows.name: Etherealness
rows.target: You and one other touched creature per three levels
rows.short_description: As ethereal jaunt but you and linked willing creatures become ethereal; on expiration all return to the Material Plane.

rows.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
rows.short_description: Rubbery tentacles grapple (+8 + caster level) and crush for 1d6+4 each round; creatures entering are attacked; movement through area is halved.

rows.name: Expeditious Retreat
rows.short_description: Your base land speed increases by 30 ft. (enhancement).

rows.name: Explosive Runes
rows.target: One touched object weighing no more than 10 lb.
rows.short_description: Placed on writing; detonates for 6d6 force when read; reader takes full, others within 10 ft. Reflex half; DC to find/disable = 25 + spell level.

rows.name: Eyebite
rows.short_description: Each round target you choose suffers effects by HD: 10+ sickened; 5–9 panicked then shaken; 4− comatose, panicked, sickened.

rows.name: Fabricate
rows.target: Up to 10 cu. ft./level of material (1 cu. ft./level for minerals)
rows.short_description: Convert raw material into finished items of the same substance; requires appropriate Craft check; 1 round/10 cu. ft. (or 1 cu. ft. for minerals).

rows.name: Faerie Fire
rows.area: Creatures and objects within a 5-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Outlines subjects with dim colored light; negates benefits of concealment from darkness, blur, displacement, invisibility (but not higher magical darkness).

rows.name: False Life
rows.short_description: Gain 1d10 +1/level (max +10) temporary hit points.

rows.name: False Vision
rows.short_description: Scrying shows a major image you define; you can concentrate to alter it during the duration.

rows.name: Fear
rows.short_description: Creatures in cone become panicked on failed save (cower if cornered); on success, shaken for 1 round.

rows.name: Feather Fall
rows.target: One Medium or smaller free-falling object or creature/level, no two of which may be more than 20 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Targets fall at 60 ft./round and take no damage on landing while active; can be cast out of turn as a free action.

rows.name: Feeblemind
rows.short_description: Target’s Int and Cha drop to 1; loses Int/Cha-based skills, speech, language, and spellcasting; arcane casters take −4 on the save; heal/limited wish/miracle/wish ends.

rows.name: Find the Path
rows.short_description: Reveals shortest, most direct physical route to a specified location; can free subject from maze in 1 round.

rows.name: Find Traps
rows.short_description: You can use Search to detect traps like a rogue and gain +½ level (max +10) insight bonus on Search checks to find traps.

rows.name: Finger of Death
rows.short_description: Slays one living creature (Fort negates); on a successful save deals 3d6 +1/level (max +25) damage instead.

rows.name: Fire Seeds
rows.target: Up to four touched acorns or up to eight touched holly berries
rows.saving_throw: None or Reflex half; see text
rows.short_description: Acorn grenades: thrown splash weapons for total 1d6/level (max 20d6) fire divided among up to 4; Holly berries: command-detonated 1d8+1/level (5-ft. burst) within 200 ft.

rows.name: Fire Shield
rows.short_description: Wreath of flames deals 1d6 +1/level (max +15) cold or fire to melee attackers; grants half damage (and Evasion-like) vs. the opposite energy type.

rows.name: Fire Storm
rows.short_description: Sheets of roaring flame deal 1d6/level (max 20d6); can spare natural vegetation/plant creatures you choose.

rows.name: Fire Trap
rows.short_description: Wards a closable item; opening it (by others) triggers 5-ft.-radius explosion for 1d4 +1/level (max +20) fire; attune friends with password; trap DCs = 25 + spell level.

rows.name: Fireball
rows.short_description: Pea-sized bead detonates for 1d6/level (max 10d6) fire; ignites combustibles; can melt soft metals; may detonate early if blocked.

rows.name: Flame Arrow
rows.target: Fifty projectiles in contact at casting
rows.short_description: Ammunition deals +1d6 fire on hit; can ignite flammable objects; doesn’t set struck creatures ablaze.

rows.name: Flame Blade
rows.short_description: Wield a scimitar-like blade of fire; melee touch attacks deal 1d8 +1/2 levels (max +10) fire; ignites combustibles; doesn’t work underwater.

rows.name: Flame Strike
rows.short_description: Column of divine fire deals 1d6/level (max 15d6); half is fire, half divine (not reduced by fire resistance).

rows.name: Flaming Sphere
rows.short_description: Rolling 5-ft. sphere moves 30 ft./round and deals 2d6 fire to a creature it enters (Ref negates); ignites combustibles; needs your move action to direct.

rows.name: Flare
rows.short_description: Burst of light dazzles one creature for 1 minute.

rows.name: Flesh to Stone
rows.short_description: Turns a living creature (and its gear) to inert stone; damage to statue persists if later restored.

rows.name: Fly
rows.short_description: Subject flies 60 ft. (good) or 40 ft. in medium/heavy armor; descends safely for 1d6 rounds when duration ends.

rows.name: Fog Cloud
rows.short_description: Obscures vision beyond 5 ft.; within 5 ft. creatures have concealment; dispersed by moderate/strong wind; doesn’t function underwater.

rows.name: Forbiddance
rows.short_description: Seals area against planar travel; damages entrants of different alignment (6d6 or 12d6, Will half); can include a password; overlapping effects don’t stack.

rows.name: Forcecage
rows.area: Barred cage (20-ft. cube) or windowless cell (10-ft. cube)
rows.short_description: Invisible cage/walls of force imprison creatures; blocks ethereal travel; can be disintegrated; barred version allows spells/breath weapons through gaps.

rows.name: Foresight
rows.short_description: You’re never surprised or flat-footed; gain warnings of danger and +2 insight bonus to AC and Reflex (not granted to a different target).

rows.name: Fox's Cunning
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Intelligence; increases save DCs of Int-based spells cast during duration (no bonus spells or skill points).

rows.name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As fox’s cunning, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Freedom
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) or see text
rows.short_description: Frees subject from restraints and effects like paralysis, petrification, slow, web, maze, imprisonment (the last two require casting at the exact spot and knowing the victim).

rows.name: Freedom of Movement
rows.short_description: Move and attack normally in magical impediments; auto-succeed to resist or escape grapples/pins; allows normal movement/attacks underwater.

rows.name: Gaseous Form
rows.short_description: Subject becomes misty and insubstantial; DR 10/magic; immune to poison and crits; fly 10 ft. (perfect); pass through cracks; can’t attack or cast normal spells.
